019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import cloud.commandframework.services.ServicePipeline;
022import com.google.inject.Inject;
023import com.plotsquared.core.PlotSquared;
024import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.Settings;
025import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
026import com.plotsquared.core.database.DBFunc;
027import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlayerAutoPlotEvent;
028import com.plotsquared.core.events.PlotAutoMergeEvent;
029import com.plotsquared.core.events.Result;
030import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
031import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.PermissionHandler;
032import com.plotsquared.core.player.MetaDataAccess;
033import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlayerMetaDataKeys;
034import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
035import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
036import com.plotsquared.core.plot.PlotArea;
037import com.plotsquared.core.plot.world.PlotAreaManager;
038import com.plotsquared.core.services.plots.AutoService;
039import com.plotsquared.core.util.EconHandler;
040import com.plotsquared.core.util.EventDispatcher;
041import com.plotsquared.core.util.PlotExpression;
042import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.AutoClaimFinishTask;
043import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.RunnableVal;
044import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.TaskManager;
045import io.leangen.geantyref.TypeToken;
046import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
047import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
048import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
049import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
050import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
051
052import java.util.Collections;
053import java.util.Iterator;
054import java.util.List;
055import java.util.stream.Collectors;
056
057@CommandDeclaration(command = "auto",
058        permission = "plots.auto",
059        category = CommandCategory.CLAIMING,
060        requiredType = RequiredType.NONE,
061        aliases = "a",
062        usage = "/plot auto [length, width]")
063public class Auto extends SubCommand {
064
065    private final PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager;
066    private final EventDispatcher eventDispatcher;
067    private final EconHandler econHandler;
068    private final ServicePipeline servicePipeline;
069
070    @Inject
071    public Auto(
072            final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager,
073            final @NonNull EventDispatcher eventDispatcher,
074            final @NonNull EconHandler econHandler,
075            final @NonNull ServicePipeline servicePipeline
076    ) {
077        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
078        this.eventDispatcher = eventDispatcher;
079        this.econHandler = econHandler;
080        this.servicePipeline = servicePipeline;
081        this.servicePipeline.registerServiceType(TypeToken.get(AutoService.class), new AutoService.DefaultAutoService());
082        final AutoService.MultiPlotService multiPlotService = new AutoService.MultiPlotService();
083        this.servicePipeline.registerServiceImplementation(AutoService.class, multiPlotService,
084                Collections.singletonList(multiPlotService)
085        );
086        final AutoService.SinglePlotService singlePlotService = new AutoService.SinglePlotService();
087        this.servicePipeline.registerServiceImplementation(AutoService.class, singlePlotService,
088                Collections.singletonList(singlePlotService)
089        );
090    }
091
092    public static boolean checkAllowedPlots(
093            PlotPlayer<?> player, PlotArea plotarea,
094            @Nullable Integer allowedPlots, int sizeX, int sizeZ
095    ) {
096        if (allowedPlots == null) {
097            allowedPlots = player.getAllowedPlots();
098        }
099        int currentPlots;
100        if (Settings.Limit.GLOBAL) {
101            currentPlots = player.getPlotCount();
102        } else {
103            currentPlots = player.getPlotCount(plotarea.getWorldName());
104        }
105        int diff = allowedPlots - currentPlots;
106        if (diff - sizeX * sizeZ < 0) {
107            try (final MetaDataAccess<Integer> metaDataAccess = player.accessPersistentMetaData(
108                    PlayerMetaDataKeys.PERSISTENT_GRANTED_PLOTS)) {
109                if (metaDataAccess.isPresent()) {
110                    int grantedPlots = metaDataAccess.get().orElse(0);
111                    if (diff < 0 && grantedPlots < sizeX * sizeZ) {
112                        player.sendMessage(
113                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.cant_claim_more_plots"),
114                                TagResolver.resolver("amount", Tag.inserting(Component.text(diff + grantedPlots)))
115                        );
116                        return false;
117                    } else if (diff >= 0 && grantedPlots + diff < sizeX * sizeZ) {
118                        player.sendMessage(
119                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.cant_claim_more_plots"),
120                                TagResolver.resolver("amount", Tag.inserting(Component.text(diff + grantedPlots)))
121                        );
122                        return false;
123                    } else {
124                        int left = grantedPlots + diff < 0 ? 0 : diff - sizeX * sizeZ;
125                        if (left == 0) {
126                            metaDataAccess.remove();
127                        } else {
128                            metaDataAccess.set(left);
129                        }
130                        player.sendMessage(
131                                TranslatableCaption.of("economy.removed_granted_plot"),
132                                TagResolver.builder()
133                                        .tag("usedGrants", Tag.inserting(Component.text(grantedPlots - left)))
134                                        .tag("remainingGrants", Tag.inserting(Component.text(left)))
135                                        .build()
136                        );
137                    }
138                } else {
139                    player.sendMessage(
140                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.cant_claim_more_plots"),
141                            TagResolver.resolver("amount", Tag.inserting(Component.text(player.getAllowedPlots())))
142                    );
143                    return false;
144                }
145            }
146        }
147        return true;
148    }
149
150    private void claimSingle(
151            final @NonNull PlotPlayer<?> player, final @NonNull Plot plot,
152            final @NonNull PlotArea plotArea, final @Nullable String schematic
153    ) {
154        try (final MetaDataAccess<Boolean> metaDataAccess =
155                     player.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_AUTO)) {
156            metaDataAccess.set(true);
157        }
158        plot.setOwnerAbs(player.getUUID());
159
160        final RunnableVal<Plot> runnableVal = new RunnableVal<>() {
161            {
162                this.value = plot;
163            }
164
165            @Override
166            public void run(final Plot plot) {
167                try {
168                    TaskManager.getPlatformImplementation().sync(
169                            new AutoClaimFinishTask(player, plot, plotArea, schematic,
170                                    PlotSquared.get().getEventDispatcher()
171                            ));
172                } catch (final Exception e) {
173                    e.printStackTrace();
174                }
175            }
176        };
177
178        DBFunc.createPlotSafe(plot, runnableVal, () -> claimSingle(player, plot, plotArea, schematic));
179
180    }
181
182    @Override
183    public boolean onCommand(final PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
184        PlotArea plotarea = player.getApplicablePlotArea();
185        if (plotarea == null) {
186            final PermissionHandler permissionHandler = PlotSquared.platform().permissionHandler();
187            if (permissionHandler.hasCapability(
188                    PermissionHandler.PermissionHandlerCapability.PER_WORLD_PERMISSIONS)) {
189                for (final PlotArea area : this.plotAreaManager.getAllPlotAreas()) {
190                    if (player.hasPermission(area.getWorldName(), "plots.auto")) {
191                        if (plotarea != null) {
192                            plotarea = null;
193                            break;
194                        }
195                        plotarea = area;
196                    }
197                }
198            }
199            if (this.plotAreaManager.getAllPlotAreas().length == 1) {
200                plotarea = this.plotAreaManager.getAllPlotAreas()[0];
201            }
202            if (plotarea == null) {
203                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot_world"));
204                return false;
205            }
206        }
207        int sizeX = 1;
208        int sizeZ = 1;
209        String schematic = null;
210        boolean mega = false;
211        if (args.length > 0) {
212            try {
213                String[] split = args[0].split("[,;]");
214                if (split.length == 2) {
215                    sizeX = Integer.parseInt(split[0]);
216                    sizeZ = Integer.parseInt(split[1]);
217                } else {
218                    player.sendMessage(
219                            TranslatableCaption.of("commandconfig.command_syntax"),
220                            TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text(getUsage())))
221                    );
222                    return true;
223                }
224                if (sizeX < 1 || sizeZ < 1) {
225                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("error.plot_size_negative"));
226                    return true;
227                }
228                if (args.length > 1) {
229                    schematic = args[1];
230                }
231                mega = true;
232            } catch (NumberFormatException ignored) {
233                sizeX = 1;
234                sizeZ = 1;
235                schematic = args[0];
236            }
237        }
238        PlayerAutoPlotEvent event = this.eventDispatcher
239                .callAuto(player, plotarea, schematic, sizeX, sizeZ);
240        if (event.getEventResult() == Result.DENY) {
241            player.sendMessage(
242                    TranslatableCaption.of("events.event_denied"),
243                    TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("Auto claim")))
244            );
245            return true;
246        }
247        boolean force = event.getEventResult() == Result.FORCE;
248        sizeX = event.getSizeX();
249        sizeZ = event.getSizeZ();
250        schematic = event.getSchematic();
251        if (!force && mega && !player.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_AUTO_MEGA)) {
252            player.sendMessage(
253                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
254                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_AUTO_MEGA))
255            );
256            return false;
257        }
258        if (!force && sizeX * sizeZ > Settings.Claim.MAX_AUTO_AREA) {
259            player.sendMessage(
260                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.cant_claim_more_plots_num"),
261                    TagResolver.resolver("amount", Tag.inserting(Component.text(Settings.Claim.MAX_AUTO_AREA)))
262            );
263            return false;
264        }
265        final int allowed_plots = player.getAllowedPlots();
266        try (final MetaDataAccess<Boolean> metaDataAccess =
267                     player.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_AUTO)) {
268            if (!force && (metaDataAccess.get().orElse(false) || !checkAllowedPlots(player,
269                    plotarea, allowed_plots, sizeX, sizeZ
270            ))) {
271                return false;
272            }
273        }
274
275        if (schematic != null && !schematic.isEmpty()) {
276            if (!plotarea.hasSchematic(schematic)) {
277                player.sendMessage(
278                        TranslatableCaption.of("schematics.schematic_invalid_named"),
279                        TagResolver.builder()
280                                .tag("schemname", Tag.inserting(Component.text(schematic)))
281                                .tag("reason", Tag.inserting(Component.text("non-existent")))
282                                .build()
283                );
284                return true;
285            }
286            if (!force && !player.hasPermission(
287                    Permission.PERMISSION_CLAIM_SCHEMATIC.format(schematic)
288            ) && !player.hasPermission("plots.admin.command.schematic")) {
289                player.sendMessage(
290                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
291                        TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Component.text("plots.claim.%s0")))
292                );
293                return true;
294            }
295        }
296        if (this.econHandler != null && plotarea.useEconomy()) {
297            PlotExpression costExp = plotarea.getPrices().get("claim");
298            double cost = costExp.evaluate(Settings.Limit.GLOBAL ?
299                    player.getPlotCount() :
300                    player.getPlotCount(plotarea.getWorldName()));
301            cost = (sizeX * sizeZ) * cost;
302            if (cost > 0d) {
303                if (!this.econHandler.isSupported()) {
304                    player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("economy.vault_or_consumer_null"));
305                    return false;
306                }
307                if (!force && this.econHandler.getMoney(player) < cost) {
308                    player.sendMessage(
309                            TranslatableCaption.of("economy.cannot_afford_plot"),
310                            TagResolver.builder()
311                                    .tag("money", Tag.inserting(Component.text(this.econHandler.format(cost))))
312                                    .tag(
313                                            "balance",
314                                            Tag.inserting(Component.text(this.econHandler.format(this.econHandler.getMoney(player))))
315                                    )
316                                    .build()
317                    );
318                    return false;
319                }
320                this.econHandler.withdrawMoney(player, cost);
321                player.sendMessage(
322                        TranslatableCaption.of("economy.removed_balance"),
323                        TagResolver.resolver("money", Tag.inserting(Component.text(this.econHandler.format(cost))))
324                );
325            }
326        }
327
328        List<Plot> plots = this.servicePipeline
329                .pump(new AutoService.AutoQuery(player, null, sizeX, sizeZ, plotarea))
330                .through(AutoService.class)
331                .getResult();
332
333        plots = this.eventDispatcher.callAutoPlotsChosen(player, plots).getPlots();
334
335        if (plots.isEmpty()) {
336            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.no_free_plots"));
337            return false;
338        } else if (plots.size() == 1) {
339            this.claimSingle(player, plots.get(0), plotarea, schematic);
340        } else {
341            final Iterator<Plot> plotIterator = plots.iterator();
342            while (plotIterator.hasNext()) {
343                Plot plot = plotIterator.next();
344                if (!plot.canClaim(player)) {
345                    continue;
346                }
347                plot.claim(player, !plotIterator.hasNext(), null, true, true);
348                eventDispatcher.callPostAuto(player, plot);
349            }
350            final PlotAutoMergeEvent mergeEvent = this.eventDispatcher.callAutoMerge(
351                    plots.get(0),
352                    plots.stream().map(Plot::getId).collect(Collectors.toList())
353            );
354            if (!force && mergeEvent.getEventResult() == Result.DENY) {
355                player.sendMessage(
356                        TranslatableCaption.of("events.event_denied"),
357                        TagResolver.resolver("value", Tag.inserting(Component.text("Auto merge")))
358                );
359                return false;
360            }
361            return plotarea.mergePlots(mergeEvent.getPlots(), true);
362        }
363        return true;
364    }
365
366}
